workshoptitle: Using Data Studio to load, prepare and analyze data in the Autonomous Database

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Load demo data
tutorials.description: Load demo data for the Data Studio overview workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Understand data analysis requirements
tutorials.description: Look at a fictitious data analysis project for requirements

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Browse database objects
tutorials.description: Use Data Catalog to browse database objects

tutorials.title: Lab 6: Load additional data
tutorials.description: Use Load Data to load additional data sets

tutorials.title: Lab 7: Transform and prepare data
tutorials.description: Use Data Transforms to transform and prepare data

tutorials.title: Lab 8: Analyze data
tutorials.description: Use Data Analysis to analyze data

tutorials.title: Lab 9: Explore data insights
tutorials.description: Use Data Insight to find hidden patterns

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
